article.Heading: Tata Motors launches SUV Hexa in Rajasthan at Rs 12 lakh
article.Summary: The company has a long waiting list for the vehicle which will be cleared soon so that more and more Hexa could come on road, Business Unit President for passenger vehicles at Tata Motors Mayank Pareek said.
article.Body:
Tata Motors announced the launch of its SUV Hexa in Rajasthan.

The company has a long waiting list for the vehicle which will be cleared soon so that more and more Hexa could come on road, Business Unit President for passenger vehicles at Tata Motors Mayank Pareek said.

The ex-showroom price of manual transmission variant is Rs about Rs 12.30 lakh and automatic variant comes at Rs 15.20 lakh.
